pros: Membership gives a glance at corporate culture, serves as platform for networking, and above all teaches students about responsibility.
cons: You should be very careful and you should not allow to become all you focus and thing about.

pros: You work in an international environment, you get to a full-professional experience even before graduating, you are pushed to be out of your comfort zone, but you still have a safety new to make mistakes.
cons: It's over whelming, it+s hard to have any free time cause you work with students, not professionals who don't really expect your time, and the professionals are not very respectful cause you are still a student :)

pros: lot of friends, connections, experiences and opportunities, conferences
cons: wrong people at the wrong positions, focused on position, not their members and advancement of the team, very little space for private life with other people

pros: Best platform for young people to develop their leadership skills, also preparation for entering the real business world.
